recipe_text: Quantity; 450; Prepare 450 grams of frozen ravioli| Quantity; 2; Prepare 2 eggs| Measurement; 60; Measure out 60 grams of milk| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of bread crumbs| Measurement; 50; Measure out 50 grams of grated parmesan cheese| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Measurement; 240; Measure out 240 grams of vegetable oil| Measurement; 240; Measure out 240 grams of marinara sauce| Untimed; None; In a shallow bowl, whisk together eggs and milk| Untimed; None; In another shallow bowl, combine bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Dip each ravioli in the egg mixture, then coat with the bread crumb mixture| Untimed; None; Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat| Timed; 600; Fry ravioli in batches for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown| Untimed; None; Drain on paper towels| Untimed; None; Warm marinara sauce in a small saucepan| Finish; None; Serve fried ravioli with warm marinara sauce!
title: St. Louis Toasted Ravioli
